extensionDescription.message: Socks proxying made easy. Compatible with SSH tunneling.

enabledTitle.description: Browser Action button - title when enabled.

disabledTitle.description: Browser Action button - title when disabled.

optionsHostLabel.description: Options screen label - hostname or IP address

optionsProxyDNSLabel.description: Options screen label - Proxy DNS activation (SOCKS5 only)

optionsPassthroughLabel.description: Options screen label - passthrough hostnames and IP addresses
